channel.title: Paypal membership issue
channel.description:
I was just wondering if anyone has had an issue with using Paypal to pay for membership lately.
At first I thought it was just the paypal I was using but another person that plays Rs has the same issue.
Basically I'm not getting sent the bill so the money required for membership isn't coming out of the Paypal account however it still says I'm subscribed etc.
Has anyone better yet found a solution for this xD?

item.title: Paypal membership issue
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Ah samesame (exl Rs), it dm if its useful its nice that you took time out of your day to post :).

Read full topic

item.title: Paypal membership issue
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

I’ve never had that particular issue, but I’ve had a lot of issues paying with paypal in general over the years. I just don’t use it.

Sorry if that’s unhelpful.

Read full topic
